activities.title: Escape Room Challenge
activities.description: A thrilling activity where teams solve puzzles and riddles to 'escape' a themed room within a time limit, promoting problem-solving and teamwork.

activities.title: Charity Fun Run
activities.description: Organize a fun run where participants raise money for a chosen charity. It encourages fitness, social responsibility, and team spirit.

activities.title: Cooking Competition
activities.description: Teams compete to create the best dish within a set time. This event fosters creativity, collaboration, and is a delicious way to bond.

activities.title: Wilderness Survival Workshop
activities.description: A workshop where teams learn survival skills like shelter building and fire starting. It's great for developing leadership and teamwork in a fun, challenging environment.

activities.title: Improv Workshop
activities.description: An interactive workshop where participants engage in improvisational theater games, enhancing communication skills and quick thinking.

activities.title: Team Sports Day
activities.description: A day filled with various sports like soccer, volleyball, and tug-of-war, encouraging friendly competition and team bonding.

activities.title: Artistic Mural Creation
activities.description: Teams collaborate to create a large mural, allowing for creative expression and a sense of accomplishment when viewing the final artwork.

activities.title: Charity Build Project
activities.description: Teams work together to build something tangible (like a playground) for a local charity, promoting teamwork and community service.

activities.title: Drone Racing Tournament
activities.description: Teams learn to fly drones and then compete in a racing tournament, offering a unique, high-tech team-building experience.

activities.title: Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) Day
activities.description: A day dedicated to giving back, such as planting trees or volunteering at a food bank. This builds a sense of purpose and teamwork while contributing to the community.
